summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Creator-Facing Proposal Dashboard with password-based login and JWT authentication. All 15 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working correctly including login, dashboard, proposals list, ARRIS insights display, and logout.
passed_tests: API GET /api/creators/form-options returns platforms, niches, and ARRIS question
API POST /api/creators/register stores hashed password (password not returned in response)
API POST /api/creators/register rejects duplicate email with 400
API POST /api/creators/login returns JWT token for approved creators
API POST /api/creators/login returns 403 for pending creators with appropriate error message
API POST /api/creators/login returns 401 for wrong password
API POST /api/creators/login returns 401 for nonexistent email
API GET /api/creators/me returns creator profile (without password)
API GET /api/creators/me/dashboard returns proposal stats and recent proposals
API GET /api/creators/me/proposals returns all creator's proposals
API /me endpoints require authentication (401 without token)
API POST /api/proposals with creator token auto-fills user_id
API POST /api/proposals/{id}/submit with creator token validates ownership
API POST /api/proposals/{id}/submit generates ARRIS insights correctly
ARRIS insights have correct structure: summary, strengths, risks, recommendations, milestones
Creator Login page loads with email, password inputs and submit button
Creator Login redirects to dashboard on successful login
Creator Login shows error message for wrong credentials
Creator Dashboard shows Overview tab with stats cards (Total Proposals, Pending Review, Approved, Active Projects)
Creator Dashboard shows welcome message with creator name
Creator Dashboard shows Recent Proposals list with status badges
Creator Dashboard shows Task Progress section
My Proposals tab shows All Proposals list
Proposal detail view shows status timeline (Submitted → Review → Approved → Complete)
Proposal detail view shows ARRIS AI Insights section with summary, complexity, strengths, risks, recommendations, milestones
Creator Registration page shows all required fields including password and confirm password
Creator Registration page shows platform selection cards
Creator Registration page shows ARRIS intake question
Logout button redirects to login page and clears session
seed_data_creation: Test proposals created during testing: PP-31f01543, PP-9551df47, and others
context_for_next_testing_agent: Creator authentication is fully functional. Test creator (testcreator@example.com / creator123) is approved and has multiple proposals with ARRIS insights. Registration creates pending creators who cannot login until approved by admin. JWT tokens include role='creator' for creator users. Dashboard shows proposal stats, recent proposals with ARRIS insights, and task progress. All ARRIS insights are generated via real AI integration (not mocked).
